letters.description: Perform a comprehensive diagnostic of the birth chart to identify the client's innate personality structures and soul purpose.
Integrate planetary placements, signs, and houses into a cohesive narrative of the client's psychological and behavioral landscape.
Map current planetary movements against the natal chart to identify optimal timing for life transitions and growth opportunities.
Assess the distribution of Fire, Earth, Air, and Water to address energetic deficiencies and optimize the client's temperament.
Apply therapeutic reframing to difficult planetary configurations, transmuting internal friction into developmental strengths.
Develop a strategic roadmap for the client to manifest goals in direct harmony with their unique astrological signature.
